00064 HorizontalWidget::HorizontalWidget( QWidget* parent )
00065 :QWidget( parent ), sphereRadio( 120.0 ), m_azimuth( 0 ), m_zenith( 0 )
00066 {
00067         QVBoxLayout* mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout;
00068         setLayout( mainLayout );
00069 
00070         QWidget* examinerWidget = new QWidget;
00071         examinerWidget->setFixedSize( 490, 300 );
00072         mainLayout->addWidget(examinerWidget);
00073 
00074         m_rootNode = new SoSeparator;
00075 
00076         m_rootNode->addChild( Ejes( ) );
00077         m_rootNode->addChild( Text() );
00078     m_rootNode->addChild( Sphere() );
00079         m_rootNode->addChild( Horizon() );
00080         m_rootNode->addChild( AzimuthLine() );
00081         m_rootNode->addChild( ZenithLine() );
00082     m_rootNode->addChild( Star() );
00083 
00084         SoQtExaminerViewer* myRenderArea = new SoQtExaminerViewer( examinerWidget );
00085     myRenderArea->setSceneGraph( m_rootNode );
00086     SbColor col( 0.86f, 0.86f, 0.86f );
00087     myRenderArea->setBackgroundColor(col);
00088     myRenderArea->show(  );
00089 
00090      QWidget* labelsWidget = new QWidget;
00091     mainLayout->addWidget( labelsWidget );
00092 
00093         QGridLayout* labelsLayout = new QGridLayout;
00094         labelsWidget->setLayout( labelsLayout );
00095 
00096         QLabel* m_AzimuthLabel = new QLabel;
00097         m_AzimuthLabel->setText( "Azimuth:" );
00098         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_AzimuthLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1 );
00099 
00100         m_azimuthValue = new QLabel;
00101         m_azimuthValue->setText( QString::number( m_azimuth ) );
00102         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_azimuthValue, 0, 1, 1, 3  );
00103 
00104         QLabel* m_zenithLabel = new QLabel;
00105         m_zenithLabel->setText( "Zenith:" );
00106         labelsLayout->addWidget( m_zenithLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1 );
00107 
00108         m_zenithValue = new QLabel;
00109         m_zenithValue->setText( QString::number( m_zenith ) );

00111

00119 void HorizontalWidget::CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates coordinates )
00120 {
00121         m_azimuth = coordinates.dAzimuth;
00122         m_azimuthValue->setText( QString::number( m_azimuth ) );
00123         m_zenith = coordinates.dZenithAngle;
00124         m_zenithValue->setText( QString::number( m_zenith ) );
00125 
00126         //Azimuth Line update
00127         SoSeparator* azimuth = AzimuthLine();
00128         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 4, azimuth );
00129 
00130         //Zenith Line update
00131         SoSeparator* zenith = ZenithLine();
00132         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 5, zenith );
00133 
00134         //Star update
00135         SoSeparator* star = Star();
00136         m_rootNode->replaceChild( 6, star );
00137 }

00139 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::AzimuthLine()
00140 {
00141         //Azimuth Line
00142         SoSeparator* azimuth = new SoSeparator;
00143 
00144         SoSeparator* azimuthLine = new SoSeparator;
00145         azimuth->addChild( azimuthLine );
00146 
00147         SoMaterial* azimuthMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00148         azimuthMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 );   // Green
00149         azimuthLine->addChild( azimuthMaterial );
00150 
00151         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00152         drawstyle->lineWidth = 3;
00153         azimuthLine->addChild( drawstyle );
00154 
00155 
00156         float azimuthPoints[360][3];
00157         for( int fi = 0; fi < 360; ++fi )
00158         {
00159                 double grad = ( m_azimuth / 360 ) * fi;
00160                 azimuthPoints[fi][0] = sin( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* sphereRadio ;
00161         azimuthPoints[fi][1] =  0.0;
00162         azimuthPoints[fi][2] = -cos( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00163 
00164         }
00165 
00166         int azimuthLines[1] = {360};
00167         SoCoordinate3 * azimuthCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00168         azimuthCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, azimuthPoints );
00169         azimuthLine->addChild( azimuthCoord3 );
00170 
00171         SoLineSet* line=new SoLineSet;
00172         line->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, azimuthLines );
00173         azimuthLine->addChild( line );
00174 
00175 
00176         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00177         azimuth->addChild( curve );
00178 
00179         SoMaterial* curveMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00180         curveMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f );   // Green
00181         curve->addChild( curveMaterial );
00182 
00183         float curvePoints[270][3];
00184         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00185 
00186         int numPoints = 0;
00187         int indexes[360];
00188         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; ++index )
00189         {
00190                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00191                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00192                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00193                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00194                 numPoints++;
00195 
00196                 double grad1 = ( m_azimuth / 360 ) * 4 * ( index -1 );
00197                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* sphereRadio ;
00198         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  0.0;
00199         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -cos( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00200         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00201                 numPoints++;
00202 
00203                 double grad2 = ( m_azimuth / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00204                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* sphereRadio ;
00205         curvePoints[numPoints][1] =  0.0;
00206         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -cos( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00207         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00208                 numPoints++;
00209 
00210                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) + 3 ] = -1;
00211 
00212         }
00213 
00214 
00215         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00216         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00217         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00218 
00219         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00220         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00221         curve->addChild( facet );
00222 
00223         return azimuth;
00224 }

00226 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Ejes() const
00227 {
00228         SoSeparator* ejes = new SoSeparator;
00229 
00230         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00231         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 0.0, 0.0);   // Red
00232         ejes->addChild(myMaterial);
00233 
00234         float p[6][3]={{0.0, 0.0, 0.0},
00235                                         {sphereRadio+20, 0.0, 0.0},
00236                                         {0.0, 0.0, 0.0},
00237                                         {0.0, sphereRadio+20, 0.0},
00238                                         {0.0, 0.0, 0.0},
00239                                         {0.0, 0.0, sphereRadio+20}};
00240 
00241         SoCoordinate3* coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00242         coord3->point.setValues(0, 6, p);
00243         ejes->addChild(coord3);
00244 
00245         int lines[3]={2,2, 2};
00246         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00247         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,3,lines);
00248         ejes->addChild(lineset);
00249 
00250         return ejes;
00251 
00252 }

00254 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Horizon() const
00255 {
00256         float p[360][3];
00257         for( int fi = 0; fi<360; ++fi )
00258         {
00259                 p[fi][0] = -sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00260         p[fi][1] =  0.0;
00261         p[fi][2] = -cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00262 
00263         }
00264 
00265         int lines[1]={360};
00266         SoCoordinate3 * coord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00267         coord3->point.setValues(0, 360, p);
00268         SoSeparator* ecuador = new SoSeparator;
00269         ecuador->addChild(coord3);
00270 
00271         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
00272         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,1,lines);
00273         ecuador->addChild(lineset);
00274 
00275         return ecuador;
00276 
00277 
00278 }

00280 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget ::Sphere() const
00281 {
00282         SoSeparator* sph = new SoSeparator;
00283 
00284         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00285         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );   // Blue
00286         myMaterial->transparency.setValue( 0.3f );
00287         sph->addChild( myMaterial );
00288 
00289         SoComplexity* complexity = new SoComplexity;
00290         complexity->value = 0.5;
00291         sph->addChild( complexity );
00292 
00293         SoSphere* sphere=new SoSphere;
00294         sphere->radius = sphereRadio;
00295         sph->addChild(sphere);
00296 
00297         return sph;
00298 }
00299 
00300 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Star()
00301 {
00302         //Star definition
00303         SoSeparator* star = new SoSeparator;
00304 
00305         SoMaterial *myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00306         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue(1.0, 1.0, 0.0);   // yellow
00307         star->addChild(myMaterial);
00308 
00309         SoTranslation* starTransform = new SoTranslation;
00310         starTransform->translation.setValue( sin( m_zenith * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* sin( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio,
00311                 cos( m_zenith * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio,
00312                 -sin( m_zenith * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* cos( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) )  * sphereRadio ) ;
00313         star->addChild( starTransform);
00314 
00315         SoSphere* sphere=new SoSphere;
00316         sphere->radius=10;
00317         star->addChild(sphere);
00318 
00319         return star;
00320 
00321 }

00323 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::Text(){
00324 
00325         SoSeparator* text = new SoSeparator;
00326 
00327         SoMaterial* myMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00328         myMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 1.0, 0.0, 0.0 );   // Red
00329         text->addChild( myMaterial );
00330 
00331         SoSeparator* norte = new SoSeparator;
00332         SoTransform* norteTransf = new SoTransform;
00333         norteTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0, 0, -( sphereRadio+30) ) );
00334         norte->addChild( norteTransf );
00335 
00336         SoText3* northText= new SoText3();
00337         northText->string.setValue("N");
00338         northText->justification = SoText3::CENTER;
00339         northText->parts = SoText3::ALL;
00340         norte->addChild( northText );
00341         text->addChild( norte );
00342 
00343         SoSeparator* south = new SoSeparator;
00344         SoTransform* southTransf = new SoTransform;
00345         southTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( 0, 0, ( sphereRadio+30 ) ) );
00346         south->addChild( southTransf );
00347 
00348         SoText3* southText = new SoText3();
00349         southText->string.setValue("S");
00350         southText->justification = SoText3::CENTER;
00351         southText->parts = SoText3::ALL;
00352         south->addChild( southText );
00353         text->addChild( south );
00354 
00355         SoSeparator* east = new SoSeparator;
00356         SoTransform* eastTransf = new SoTransform;
00357         eastTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( ( sphereRadio+30 ), 0.0, 0.0 ) );
00358         east->addChild( eastTransf );
00359 
00360         SoText3* eastText = new SoText3();
00361         eastText->string.setValue("E");
00362         eastText->justification = SoText3::CENTER;
00363         eastText->parts = SoText3::ALL;
00364         east->addChild( eastText );
00365         text->addChild( east );
00366 
00367         SoSeparator* west = new SoSeparator;
00368         SoTransform* westTransf = new SoTransform;
00369         westTransf->translation.setValue( SbVec3f( -( sphereRadio+30 ), 0.0, 0.0 ) );
00370         west->addChild( westTransf );
00371 
00372         SoText3* westText = new SoText3();
00373         westText->string.setValue("W");
00374         westText->justification = SoText3::CENTER;
00375         westText->parts = SoText3::ALL;
00376         west->addChild( westText );
00377         text->addChild( west );
00378 
00379         return text;
00380 }

00382 SoSeparator* HorizontalWidget::ZenithLine()
00383 {
00384 
00385         SoSeparator* zenith = new SoSeparator;
00386 
00387         SoMaterial* zenithMaterial = new SoMaterial;
00388         zenithMaterial->diffuseColor.setValue( 0.0, 1.0, 0.0 );   // Green
00389         zenith->addChild( zenithMaterial );
00390 
00391         //Zenith Line
00392         SoSeparator* zenithLine = new SoSeparator;
00393         zenith->addChild( zenithLine );
00394 
00395         SoDrawStyle * drawstyle = new SoDrawStyle;
00396         drawstyle->lineWidth = 4;
00397         zenithLine->addChild( drawstyle );
00398 
00399         float zenithPoints[360][3];
00400 
00401         double fi = m_azimuth;
00402         for( int theta = 0; theta< 360; ++theta )
00403         {
00404                 double grad = ( m_zenith / 360 ) * theta;
00405                 zenithPoints[theta][0] = sin( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sin( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* sphereRadio;
00406         zenithPoints[theta][1] = cos( grad  * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio;
00407         zenithPoints[theta][2] = -sin( grad * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * cos( fi * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00408         }
00409 
00410 
00411         int zenithLines[1] = {360};
00412         SoCoordinate3 * zenithCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00413         zenithCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 360, zenithPoints );
00414         zenithLine->addChild( zenithCoord3 );
00415 
00416         SoLineSet* line=new SoLineSet;
00417         line->numVertices.setValues( 0, 1, zenithLines );
00418         zenithLine->addChild( line );
00419 
00420         //Surface
00421         SoSeparator* curve = new SoSeparator;
00422         zenith->addChild( curve );
00423 
00424         float curvePoints[270][3];
00425         Point3D center( 0, 0, 0 );
00426 
00427         int numPoints = 0;
00428         int indexes[360];
00429         for( int index = 1; index <= 90; ++index )
00430         {
00431                 curvePoints[numPoints][0]= center.x;
00432                 curvePoints[numPoints][1]= center.y;
00433                 curvePoints[numPoints][2]= center.z;
00434                 indexes[ ( index -1 ) * 4 ] = numPoints;
00435                 numPoints++;
00436 
00437                 double grad1 = ( m_zenith / 360 ) * 4 * (index -1 );
00438                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sin( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* sphereRadio;
00439         curvePoints[numPoints][1] = cos( grad1  * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio;
00440         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -sin( grad1 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * cos( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00441         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +1 ] = numPoints;
00442                 numPoints++;
00443 
00444                 double grad2 = ( m_zenith / 360 ) * 4 * index;
00445                 curvePoints[numPoints][0] = sin( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sin( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) )* sphereRadio;
00446         curvePoints[numPoints][1] = cos( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio;
00447         curvePoints[numPoints][2] = -sin( grad2 * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * cos( m_azimuth * (tgc::Pi / 180) ) * sphereRadio ;
00448         indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) +2 ] = numPoints;
00449                 numPoints++;
00450 
00451                 indexes[ ( ( index -1 ) * 4  ) + 3 ] = -1;
00452 
00453         }
00454 
00455 
00456         SoCoordinate3 * curveCoord3 = new SoCoordinate3;
00457         curveCoord3->point.setValues( 0, 270, curvePoints );
00458         curve->addChild( curveCoord3 );
00459 
00460         SoIndexedFaceSet* facet = new SoIndexedFaceSet;
00461         facet->coordIndex.setValues( 0, 360, indexes );
00462         curve->addChild( facet );
00463 
00464 
00465         return zenith;
00466 }
